RECIPE_TITLE: Watermelon Onion Yogurt Chip Dip | Watermelon Raita Recipe
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Learn to make Watermelon Onion Yogurt Chip Dip | Watermelon Raita Recipe — This watermelon onion yogurt chip dip is indeed a light and refreshing classic dip perfect for hot days. RECIPE_TITLE: Vanilla Iced Mocha With Coffee Ice Cubes | Video
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Vanilla Iced Mocha With Coffee Ice Cubes is a coffee which is classic, creamy, cold, frothy, creamy, heavy on vanilla, and stronger on coffee taste, but still a bit sweeter due to milk. 3 simple things, coffee + milk + vanilla = an amazingly delish iced coffee.

RECIPE_TITLE: Kopra Pak | Nariyal Ki Burfi | Khopra Pak Video Recipe
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Kopra Pak | Nariyal Ki Burfi | Khopra Pak is a very sophisticatedly and delicately flavored coconut sweet/mithai. It has intense coconut flavor and an amazing texture.

RECIPE_TITLE: Szechuan Spiced Carrot Fettuccine | VIDEO RECIPE
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Szechuan Spiced Carrot Fettuccine is such a perfect light meal, be it for lunch or dinner. This is the most beautiful, mouthwatering, spicy, flavorful, vegan and gluten free fettuccine. And it packs so much flavor. The carrots are slightly crunchy and they are best when paired nicely with this spicy sauce. It has Szechuan sauce, veggies, zesty tahini garlic paste, hot sauce for some spicy goodness and some tomato ketchup for tang and sweetness.

RECIPE_TITLE: Instant Peach Jalebi Topped with Whipped Cream and Pistachio
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Instant Peach Jalebi Topped with Whipped Cream and Pistachio. Jalebi is a very popular and traditional Indian sweet dish, generally made on every Indian festival, celebrations and special occasions. No matter what's the age — everybody just loves these Jalebis.

RECIPE_TITLE: Corn Cream Cheese Flatbread with Orange Vinaigrette | Video
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Corn Cream Cheese Flatbread with Orange Vinaigrette is a cheesy flatbread but different from pizza. It has all the goodness of cheese, fruits and veggies.

RECIPE_TITLE: No Bake Strawberry Cheesecake Bites | Video Recipe
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: With these No Bake Strawberry Cheesecake Bites, you don’t have to worry about finishing the whole cheesecake. But that doesn’t mean that I am saying we always have to stick with just one, or two, or three bites. But at least the option of eating less is there, right? Plus, they are no bake and they are perfectly bite sized. They also have just the right amount of strawberry cheesecake goodness in every single bite.

RECIPE_TITLE: Spiced Rice Lentils with Grilled Pineapple And Cucumber Honey Lemon Yogurt
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Spiced Rice Lentils aka khichdi with Grilled Pineapple And Cucumber Honey Lemon Yogurt is a vibrant platter full of good health and deliciousness. RECIPE_TITLE: Whole-wheat Peach Mushroom Pizza with Feta and Fresh Basil
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Whole wheat Peach Mushroom Pizza with Feta and Fresh Basil. I rolled the dough and covered with a generous amount of regular pizza sauce. Then topped with lots of cheese. Also topped with peach slices, bell pepper, sliced mushrooms, and sliced onions. Again topped with some more cheese. Finally sprinkled some garlic powder and pepper powder.

RECIPE_TITLE: Chickpea Sweet Potato Burger with Chipotle Aioli
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: These are crispy edged, deliciously spiced, sweet potato-chickpea patties dipped in chipotle aioli. These veggie patties are full of awesome flavors.

RECIPE_TITLE: Red Grapes Onion Cucumber Raita (RECIPE + STORY)
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Red Grapes Onion Cucumber Raita is one of those dishes which can be prepared quickly in just a few minutes. Not so much messy, but super rich and creamy.

RECIPE_TITLE: Malpua Recipe | How To Make Malpua | Rajasthani Mawa Malpua Recipe
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Detailed recipe of Rajasthani Mawa Malpua along with step by step video tutorial. Mawa Malpua is a delicious and traditionally popular Rajasthani breakfast/dessert. Traditionally, they are fried pancakes dipped in saffron+cardamom flavoured warm sugar syrup and served warm along with kesar rabdi.

RECIPE_TITLE: No-Bake Cream Cheese Lemon Mousse
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: This No-Bake Cream Cheese Lemon Mousse is a delightful dessert which is made with only 6 ingredients. Every single spoonful of this dessert is so rich, creamy and packed with fresh and zesty lemon flavor.

RECIPE_TITLE: Coconut Milk Peanut Butter Truffles | Video
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: A Coconut Milk Peanut Butter Truffle is a mouthful of love. They really could not be better. I mean, coconut milk, peanut butter and chocolate. They are perfect bite sized too. There are very few ingredients and they are GLUTEN-FREE too!

RECIPE_TITLE: Rasgulla Recipe | How To Make Soft And Spongy Rasgulla At Home | Sweet Recipes | रसगुल्ला  + Video Recipe
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Sponge Rasgulla is melt-in-mouth soft paneer ball-shaped dumplings made of chena ( छैना ) and then cooked in a light syrup made of sugar.

RECIPE_TITLE: Red Cabbage Zucchini Chana Dal
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Red Cabbage Zucchini Chana Dal is a simple, delish, quick, vegan, gluten-free and dairy-free curry. Lentils + veggies in a single dish is a heavenly combo.

RECIPE_TITLE: Creamy Sweet Potato Carrot Soup | Video Recipe

RECIPE_TITLE: Pepper Onion Potato Paratha

RECIPE_TITLE: Pumpkin Tofu Halwa
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: This Pumpkin Tofu Halwa has a nice aroma of cardamom with the slightly roasting flavour of tofu, and creaminess of pumpkin. When they all came together at one place, it was like a match made in heaven.

RECIPE_TITLE: Broccoli Paratha With Garlic Roasted Veggies And Spiced Coconut Sauce [RECIPE+STORY]

RECIPE_TITLE: Moong Dal Toast
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Moong Dal Toast is a healthy, delicious, nutritious, and easy breakfast recipe. It is super quick. It really is. If you have cooked lentils, then this one is as easy as cake.

RECIPE_TITLE: No-Bake Mini Strawberry Nutella Cheesecake | Video
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: No-Bake Mini Strawberry Nutella Cheesecake is a delicious blend of cream cheese and whipped cream. A little touch of nutella and cocoa takes this delightful dessert to the next level. It's incredibly impressive for family or guests.

RECIPE_TITLE: Quick And Easy Pineapple Kiwi Honey Yogurt Parfait
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Quick And Easy Pineapple Kiwi Honey Yogurt Parfait is a light fruity and delicious parfait with kiwi, pineapple, yogurt, honey and cookies. So just chill it for about 1-2 hours, and you are good to go.

RECIPE_TITLE: Lehsuni Sev | Garlicky Gram Flour Noodles
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Lehsuni Sev aka Garlicky Gram Flour Noodles are crispy fried garlic flavoured snacks. The crunchy (noodles) sev has a very distinct and delectable garlic flavour. RECIPE_TITLE: Rajasthani Sweet Oliya Recipe – Fruity Rice Yogurt Pudding | Recipe Video
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Rajasthani Sweet Oliya Recipe - Fruity Rice Yogurt Pudding recipe with step by step video tutorial. This is a traditional rice and yogurt base creamy and classic pudding. Oliya is made during festival of Holi, and Sheetla Saptami which is also known as Basoda in Rajasthan.

RECIPE_TITLE: Chocolate Pots De Creme
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Chocolate Pots de Creme is a name for a classic and elegant French dessert which means 'The Pot Of Custard' or 'The Pot Of Cream'. This is almost like a chocolate pudding, but a thousand times better.

RECIPE_TITLE: Apple Cucumber Mozzarella Pearls Salad
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: This easy Apple Cucumber Mozzarella Pearls Salad is so fresh, and is literally bursting with color and flavor! It is trouble-free to put together too.

RECIPE_TITLE: Vermicelli Bird's Nests Recipe | Sevai Indian Dessert Recipe Video
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Vermicelli Bird's Nests Recipe | Sevai Indian Dessert Recipe is so easy to throw together. And something about the sweet, aromatic and crunchy combo makes them so irresistible to me! I seriously can not stop eating them.

RECIPE_TITLE: French Style Puff Pastry Filled With Raspberry Crème Fraîche | VIDEO Recipe
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: These gorgeous little Raspberry Creme Puffs are easy to make and are a perfect treat to make for Valentine’s Day. They are simple and so light. Plus, these are so easy to prepare. Also they look and taste absolutely fantastic.

RECIPE_TITLE: Baked Garlicky Sweet Potato Chips
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Baked Garlicky Sweet Potato Chips are crispy, sweet-salty, and seasoned chips. Some garlic, pepper powder, and salt is all that is required to make them mouth-watering.

RECIPE_TITLE: Rye Crispbread Chaat

RECIPE_TITLE: Mini Apple Pear Tarte Tatin | Video Recipe

RECIPE_TITLE: Mix Vegetable Pakora | Video Recipe
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Mix Veg Pakoras are an easy to make Indian starter or snack or appetizer which are prepared with chickpea flour and spices.

RECIPE_TITLE: Samosa French Loaf With Coriander Chutney | Video

RECIPE_TITLE: Almond Peas Curry - Matar Badam Curry
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Almond Peas Curry - Matar Badam Curry is a spicy, a little tangy, slightly sweet and full of that yummy curry flavor.

RECIPE_TITLE: Strawberry Masala Chaas (Spiced Strawberry Buttermilk)
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Strawberry Masala Chaas (Spiced Strawberry Buttermilk)is a strawberry flavoured spiced North Indian buttermilk. It is healthy and refreshing drink — a perfect treat for the summer.

RECIPE_TITLE: Mint Coriander Tandoori Roti | VIDEO RECIPE

RECIPE_TITLE: 15 minutes No Oil Green Thai Curry Chow-Mein Noodles
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: 15 minutes No Oil Green Thai Curry Chow-Mein Noodles. This noodle is so simple and utterly delicious. This 15 minutes No Oil Thai Green Curry Chow-Mein Noodles is possibly one of the easiest recipes I have posted as a full meal.

RECIPE_TITLE: Cholar Dal - Bengal Style Bengal Gram

This is also rich in proteins.

RECIPE_TITLE: Aloo Palak Paratha Recipe – Potato stuffed Spinach Flatbread
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Learn to make Aloo Palak Paratha Recipe - Potato stuffed Spinach Flatbread with step-by-step photo instructions. RECIPE_TITLE: Apple Cinnamon Spiced Choco Coffee with Ice Cream
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Apple Cinnamon Spiced Choco Coffee with Ice Cream is a steaming hot beverage. It is sweet, and perfect for christmas and holiday parties.

RECIPE_TITLE: No Bake Almond Flowers - Badam Katli
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: These No Bake Almond Flowers or Badam Katli make a quick and easy dessert. These cute little flowers are adorably tiny and making them is as easy as pie – kids would simply love these.

RECIPE_TITLE: Toasted Coconut Sesame Rice Krispie and Multigrain Cheerios Dark Chocolate Bars
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Toasted Coconut Sesame Rice Krispie and Multigrain Cheerios Dark Chocolate Bars. These particular bars have toasted coconut, toasted sesame seeds, marshmallow, coconut oil, rice krispie, multigrain cheerios and dark chocolate. They are simply amazing.

RECIPE_TITLE: Mooli Paratha With Strawberry Grapes Chutney | Video

RECIPE_TITLE: Vegan Thai Green Curry Vegetable Noodles | Video Recipe

RECIPE_TITLE: Zero-Oil Mint-Chola Cornmeal Tart | Video Recipe

RECIPE_TITLE: Cabbage Spinach Thepla (Recipe + Story)

RECIPE_TITLE: Pineapple Coconut Rabri

RECIPE_TITLE: Spanish Style Omelette Recipe – Tortilla Española | Video Recipe
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: This Spanish Style Omelette Recipe - Tortilla Española is traditionally made from eggs, potatoes, onions and chorizo or tuna. To make it vegetarian I added vegetables instead of chorizo or tuna. You know what I love most about this dish — it’s so rich, classic and versatile.

RECIPE_TITLE: Peas Coconut Peda Recipe | Matar Nariyal Ke Pede

RECIPE_TITLE: Blueberry Oatmeal Breakfast Crumble Bars

RECIPE_TITLE: Strawberry White Hot Chocolate | Video

RECIPE_TITLE: Kidney Bean Tostadas with Bell Pepper Salsa
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Kidney Bean Tostadas with Bell Pepper Salsa is a mexican, spanish dish for very famous for lunch or dinner. This is full of awesomeness includes bell pepper.

RECIPE_TITLE: Eggless Chocolate Mousse

RECIPE_TITLE: Chocolate Molten Lava Mug Cake

RECIPE_TITLE: Spiced Fenugreek Beet Baked Mathri

RECIPE_TITLE: Rice Krispie Cornflakes Bhel | Video

RECIPE_TITLE: Cherry-Berry Iced Tea With Lemon Mint Ginger And Honey
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Cherry-Berry Iced Tea With Lemon Mint Ginger And Honey has all the goodness of berries, freshness of lemon and mint, piquant taste of ginger, and sweetness of honey. RECIPE_TITLE: Tortilla Poha With Kiwi Peanut Salsa | Video

RECIPE_TITLE: Coconut Milk Banana Strawberry Smoothie Topped With Toasted Coconut
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: This Coconut Milk Banana Strawberry Smoothie topped with toasted coconut is a healthy, and nutritious breakfast smoothie.

RECIPE_TITLE: Chickpea Zucchini Mushroom Pizza with Pickled Peppers and Olives
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Chickpea Zucchini Mushroom Pizza with Pickled Peppers and Olives. I rolled the dough first. Spread generous amount of sauce over pizza. Spread mozzarella cheese. RECIPE_TITLE: Carrot Zucchini Semolina Pancake With Potato Patties and Fresh Salad [RECIPE+STORY]

RECIPE_TITLE: Chocolate Vanilla Mocha Frappuccino

RECIPE_TITLE: Banana Chocolate Muffins with Wheat Flour

RECIPE_TITLE: Rajma Masala - Spiced Kidney Beans in Tomato Rich Gravy

RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Indian Spiced Dal Chawal Arancini Paired with Pickled Mayonnaise, Split Bengal Gram Salad, and Raspberry Sauce - Baked Version. This taste so good — plus, this is packed with so many flavours, textures and perfect crispness.

RECIPE_TITLE: Caramelized Peach Pesto Tart with Blueberries and Pistachio
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: These Caramelized Peach Pesto Tart with Blueberries and Pistachio are so full of caramelized peaches, pesto, feta cheese and some more feta cheese with fresh blueberries and pistachio. These ingredients really go incredibly well together.

RECIPE_TITLE: Salty-Sweet Whole Wheat Onion Crackers Recipe

RECIPE_TITLE: No-Bake Oats and Chia Energy Balls Recipe Video | Energy Bites
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Learn to make No-Bake Oats and Chia Energy Balls Recipe — Energy Bites with step by step video tutorial. These balls are loaded with oats, shredded coconut, chia seeds, vanilla, honey, peanut butter, white chocolate, dark chocolate, and flax seeds.

RECIPE_TITLE: Chocolate Souffle | Video
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Chocolate Soufflé — an awesome Valentine's Day dessert that's sure to impress your loved one. These dark chocolate soufflés are a perfect finishing touch to dinner parties or a quiet romantic dinner.

RECIPE_TITLE: Mung Bean Pita Burger With Caramelized Oranges And Mango Chutney
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Mung Bean Pita Burger With Caramelized Oranges And Mango Chutney is made with green gram. This is a cheese free burger, and also this packed with lots of fruits and veggies.

RECIPE_TITLE: Strawberry Kiwi Sparkling Cooler | Video

RECIPE_TITLE: Super Moist Mini Chocolate Beet Cake + Muffins
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Super Moist Mini Chocolate Beet Cake + Muffins. I personally think that addition of a little coffee to a chocolate cake brings out all the flavors. The awesome thing that makes this recipe shine is coffee.

RECIPE_TITLE: Cheesy Garlic Pizza Sticks With Figs Mayo Dip | Video
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Garlic, cheese, pizza, figs + mayo dip – the perfect marriage. These yummy, cheesy, garlicky sticks of goodness are made from the ready made basic pizza base. RECIPE_TITLE: Baked Mushroom Spinach Kofta Curry (RECIPE + STORY)
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: This Baked Mushroom Spinach Kofta Curry recipe tastes like it is straight out of a restaurant. The kofta in this recipe is all about green spinach, mushrooms, boiled and mashed potatoes as balls which are baked first and and dipped in a classic tomato rich creamy sauce.

RECIPE_TITLE: Apple Cinnamon Brownie with Caramel Drizzle
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Apple Cinnamon Brownie with Caramel Drizzle. This is super simple yet exotic. Simple flavors and simple ingredients. Apples, cinnamon, cardamom, butter, almond, some nutmeg, caramel.

RECIPE_TITLE: Strawberry Cheesecake Dip For Fruits and Snacks

Imagine dipping your favorite snack in cold, sweet fruity dip, and a plus of guilt free eating when you know it is healthier. So I present to you a good healthy skinny fruit dip that you can totally feel good about eating.

RECIPE_TITLE: Potato Paneer Stuffed Roasted Red Cabbage Cones with Sriracha Sauce
RECIPE_DESCRIPTION: Potato Paneer Stuffed Roasted Red Cabbage Cones with Sriracha Sauce. They are gluten free too. And if you omit paneer they are VEGAN too. Clearly, I love paneer so my version of this dish was not VEGAN.

RECIPE_TITLE: Vegan Coconut  Blueberry Ice-Cream
